Action: Create an Affordable Housing Community Land Trust.
Progress: The City Council approved the pilot Community Land Trust program in 2018, which will continue to be evaluated.

Action: Work with community partners and government entities to acquire hotels, multi-family properties, and surplus land to preserve or redevelop them as affordable housing.
Structure renovation programs to reduce utility, energy, and maintenance costs while promoting healthy living.
Progress: In 2019 HAND is strategizing with the City's Sustainability Division on their Utah Clean Energy Initiative.
